over the years , the commission tried to make the accession process as technocratic as possible , in the hope that procedural momentum can carry it over political potholes .这些年来，欧盟委员会已经让加入欧盟的过程尽可能的技术专家政治论化，以希望程序化的因素能克服政治的漩涡。
